docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text:
use file open file FILE *file = fopen("example.txt", "w"); if (file == NULL) { perror("Error opening file for writing"); return 1; } fprintf(file, "Hello, C Programming!
"); fclose(file); convert string to num and do sum #include <stdio.h> #include <string.h> #include <math.h> #include <stdlib.h> #include <stdbool.h> int main() { FILE *file; file = fopen("shahaf", "w"); fprintf(file, "1,2,3,4,5
"); fclose(file); int sum = 0; file = fopen("shahaf", "r"); if (file == NULL) { perror("Error opening file for reading"); return 1; } char read[256]; while (fgets(read, sizeof(read), file) != NULL) { printf("%s", read); } fclose(file); const char delim[] = ","; read[strcspn(read, "
")] = '\0'; char *data = strtok(read, delim); sum = atoi(data); while (data != NULL) { printf("%s", data); data = strtok(NULL, delim); if (data != NULL) sum = sum + atoi(data); } printf("%d", sum); return 0; }
docs.title: use file

docs.text: FILE *file = fopen("example.txt", "w"); if (file == NULL) { perror("Error opening file for writing"); return 1; } fprintf(file, "Hello, C Programming!\n"); fclose(file);
docs.title: open file

docs.text: #include <stdio.h> #include <string.h> #include <math.h> #include <stdlib.h> #include <stdbool.h> int main() { FILE *file; file = fopen("shahaf", "w"); fprintf(file, "1,2,3,4,5\n"); fclose(file); int sum = 0; file = fopen("shahaf", "r"); if (file == NULL) { perror("Error opening file for reading"); return 1; } char read[256]; while (fgets(read, sizeof(read), file) != NULL) { printf("%s", read); } fclose(file); const char delim[] = ","; read[strcspn(read, "\n")] = '\0'; char *data = strtok(read, delim); sum = atoi(data); while (data != NULL) { printf("%s", data); data = strtok(NULL, delim); if (data != NULL) sum = sum + atoi(data); } printf("%d", sum); return 0; }
docs.title: convert string to num and do sum
